name: The Stress of Changing Careers
desc: At the northern training ground, you’re suddenly stopped by a treasure hunter who seems very enthusiastic…

customize.name: Adventure EXP
customize.desc: Adventure EXP. Used to improve Adventure Rank.

customize.name: Primogem
customize.desc: A primordial crystalline gem that's beyond the mundane world. Shines with the condensed hopes and dreams of universes that once were.

customize.name: Mora
customize.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

customize.name: Hero's Wit
customize.desc:
Character EXP material. Gives 20000 EXP.
These experiences are extremely precious for a pilgrim traveling through Teyvat in order to be closer to Celestia.

customize.name: Mystic Enhancement Ore
customize.desc:
Weapon EXP material. Gives 10,000 EXP.
Legend has it that this refined ingot contains the memories of battles that had taken place in the land. The weapons that benefit from these memories naturally become sentient.

customize.text:
<color=#ffffff>Achievements</color>
Dark Secret of The Hallowhands

<color=#ece5d8>Northern Training Ground, Nod-Krai</color>
<color=#ffffff>Interactive Map:</color>

<color=#ffffff>Quest Objectives</color>
Complete Vaino's first challenge
Go to the second challenge and start the challenge
Talk to Paimon
Complete Vaino's second challenge
Talk to

customize.name: Vaino
customize.desc: A former treasure hunter, who opened a training ground for children.

customize.text:
Go to the <color=#ece5d8>Krumkake Craftshop</color> and ask about the required materials
Search up higher to collect Old Portable Bearings
Talk to Sisko
Go to <color=#ece5d8>The Hallowhands’ trading spot</color>
Place the Old Portable Bearings at the trading spot
Talk to Paimon
Follow the Sniffer Mole
Follow the Sniffer Mole and collect the targets
Return the targets to Vaino
Complete Vaino’s final challenge
Talk to Vaino
